title: Mojave National Preserve: Fire Management

Five Year Work Plan  Environmental Assessment  Â       Hackberry Fire Newsletter July 1, 2005 On June 22, 2005, lightning strikes ignited seven fires that burned 70,736 acres over the next four days. The newsletter describes the fire and its aftermath.  Hackberry Fire Burned Area Emergency Response Plan July 5, 2005 A plan for mitigating damage caused by the Hackberry Complex of Fires
